Question
========
  
In an ANCOVA, a model without interactions appears to best fit the data. The factor has three levels. How many intercepts and slopes are estimated? 
Answerlist
----------
* Three intercepts, three slopes.
* One intercept, three slopes.
* Three intercepts, one slope.
* One intercept, one slope.

Solution
========

Answerlist
----------
* Incorrect
* Correct
* Incorrect
* Incorrect
